channel.title: Liz & Conor's Wedding
channel.description: Recent content on Liz & Conor's Wedding

item.title: Accommodation
item.description: There are a lot of great accommodation options in Victoria — here are a few suggestions. Note that the Friday night drinks will be in downtown Victoria, and on Saturday we will arrange a bus from the DoubleTree hotel to the Beach House and back. DoubleTree by Hilton We have arranged a 15% discount for wedding guests at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Victoria between 25-29 April. The discount is applied to the best available rate at the time of booking, using this booking link or by calling +1 250 940 3106 with the reference ‘P99 rate on April 25, 2019’.

item.title: Things to Do
item.description: We have listed some sightseeing ideas and useful links below. Victoria sightseeing Vancouver sightseeing British Columbia tourism Indigenous Tourism BC Victoria Ale Trail Butchart Gardens Whale watching Skiing at Whistler-Blackcomb (Blackcomb mountain remains open until mid-May)

item.title: Getting Here
item.description: Electronic Travel Authorization Guests coming from Ireland, the UK and other visa-exempt countries will need an Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA). You can apply for an eTA on the Government of Canada website. The application process costs CAD $7 and only takes a few minutes. Flights Airports The most convenient airports for Victoria are listed below. Victoria International Airport (YYJ) (approx. 35 minutes from the city centre by shuttle bus)

item.title: Events
item.description: Friday 26 April 2019 8 - 11 pm (TBC) Finger food and drinks in downtown Victoria Venue to be confirmed Saturday 27 April 2019 Afternoon (Time to be confirmed) Wedding ceremony at St David’s Church, Cordova Bay St David’s is a 20 minute drive from downtown Victoria A bus will take guests from the DoubleTree hotel to St David’s Evening (until 12:30 am) Reception at the Beach House, Cordova Bay
